slogan: Code with Integrity. Build with Purpose.

whoWeAre.heading: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: OTTER Laboratories is a research group focused on developing advanced tools using languages like Python, C++, and C. We build secure, efficient systems while exploring innovations in software engineering, systems design, and computational research. Through research and experimentation, we create impacts in fields that matter.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do
whatWeDo.content: We conduct research in software engineering, systems security, and computational science. We develop solutions that address real-world challenges.

latestWork.heading: Latest Work
latestWork.content: We are in the final stages of preparing for our launch. Our team is actively growing, and we are in the process of recruiting talented individuals who share our vision. Stay tuned for updates as we build something truly impactful!

joinUs.heading: Recruitment & Opportunities
joinUs.content: We're recruiting dedicated students passionate about technology and research who demonstrate drive, adaptability, and collaboration skills. Requires high school-level math and interest in coding (experience optional), with meetings on Wednesdays during spring semester. We welcome contributions and are developing a support partnership with Google, though OTTER Labs remains independent.
